budget_sets.title: Egg Fried Rice
budget_sets.description: A simple and budget-friendly meal made with leftover rice, eggs, and light seasoning. It’s filling, easy to prepare, and perfect for students or anyone who needs a quick, cheap meal without sacrificing taste.

budget_sets.title: Chicken Rice (Budget)
budget_sets.description: A basic and budget-friendly chicken rice meal with tender chicken and fresh cucumber. It’s simple, clean, and provides enough protein to keep you satisfied throughout the day.

budget_sets.title: Vegetable Fried Noodles
budget_sets.description: A cheap and delicious stir-fried noodle dish made with basic vegetables. Despite its low price, it still delivers good flavor and enough energy to keep you going.

budget_sets.title: Bread & Omelette
budget_sets.description: A simple breakfast set that combines crispy bread with a fresh omelette. Perfect for mornings when you need something cheap, fast, and satisfying.

budget_sets.title: Rice & Cabbage Soup
budget_sets.description: A comforting budget meal made of warm soup and rice. It’s very light, easy to digest, and great for days when you want something simple.

budget_sets.title: Budget Pork Stir Fry
budget_sets.description: A more affordable meat dish featuring stir-fried pork and rice. This set provides good protein while keeping the overall price low.

budget_sets.title: Instant Noodle with Egg
budget_sets.description: A fast, cheap, and classic meal for students. Adding an egg boosts the protein and makes the meal more filling while still keeping the cost extremely low.

budget_sets.title: Stir-fried Morning Glory
budget_sets.description: A popular Cambodian side dish made with fresh morning glory stir-fried in garlic. Affordable yet full of flavor and nutrients.

budget_sets.title: Chicken Porridge
budget_sets.description: A warm bowl of porridge made with soft rice and shredded chicken. It’s comforting, budget-friendly, and great for breakfast or sick days.

budget_sets.title: Budget Veggie Mix
budget_sets.description: A cheap vegetable mix that can be eaten with rice or noodles. Simple ingredients, simple flavor, but very filling for the price.

budget_sets.title: Rice with Fried Egg
budget_sets.description: A classic budget meal combination that’s quick and comforting. Perfect for days when money is tight but you still need something warm and satisfying.

budget_sets.title: Cheap Noodle Soup
budget_sets.description: A light and inexpensive noodle soup made with simple ingredients. It's warm, filling, and perfect for a budget-friendly lunch or dinner.
